1. Patch BIOS (all modules)
2. Patch controller
3. IOP request modul from BIOS again (PSX1, PSX2 or DVD) = patch this modul again


Bios version test:

read/sum 6 bytes from 100h 
v3 = 020900 = 0B
v4 = 281200 = 3A
v5/6 = 040701  = 0C
v7 = 190302  = 1E

Target Modules Offsets (hex) (module start address):
		20	30	40	50	60	70	80
PSX1DRV		E6BA0	E6BA0	F4870	F4870			FB2F0
XCDVDMAN	27C940	27E2B0	28BF80	28BF80			292A00
PS2LOGO		2EBCD0	2EE5A0	2FC2E0	2FC2E0			302EB0
OSDSYS		33AE20	33D6F0	34B430	34B430			352000

Patch Offsets (hexa):
		20	30	40	50	60	70	80
PSX1DRV		E7C94	E7C94	F5964	F5964			FC3E4
		EA0A8	EA0A8	F7D78	F7D78			FE7F8
		F13FC	F13FC	FF0CC	FF0CC			105B4C
XCDVDMAN	283408	284D78	292F04	292F04			299954
PS2LOGO		2EE324	2F0BF4	2FE934	2FE934			30528E
OSDSYS		33B050	33D920	34B660	34B660			352230
